onyomiExamples.meaning: love, affection, care, attachment, craving, desire, agape, Ireland
pet dog, beloved dog, love of dogs, fondness for dogs

kunyomiExamples.meaning: lovely, dear, beloved, darling, dearest, pitiable, pitiful
sad, miserable, unhappy, sorrowful, sad, lamentable, deplorable, grievous
to love, to cherish, to admire, to appreciate
to be frugal, to be sparing, to value, to hold dear, to regret (e.g. a loss), to feel sorry (for), to be unwilling, to be reluctant
favorite pupil, favourite pupil, teacher's pet
